Minako:you say Luna was planning this?so funny!

info.description:
jitensha's comic writing game

do you love shrink woman? do you love jitensha's comic? and you hope can see continuing of her comic? then join us

if you don't know jitensha, she is the great shrinking woman artist in the world
http://www.jitenshasw.com/
if you don't know jitensha 's comic , you can support her in here
https://www.e-junkie.com/marketplace/jitensha/tag/Size%20Fetish/78728/page/1

If you want to add the story, please follow these rules:

1. don't end the story!
2. no killing
3.please don't one sentence or some words chapters
4.don't upload jitensha's comic in anywhere
